name: places/ChIJgWG2ZIX2wokRoZ8Y5djhUEI
formattedAddress: 865 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 865 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10032-6403, USA

authorAttribution.displayName: Fred Yevich Photography By Matthew Jurewicz

originalText.text: Very nice person but Unreliable.  Never new what the next appointment would hold. Used " I'm new at this or pay the new fee or ill take your prescription back from the pharmacy!" Basically bribery because he knows you would have to go through the procedure of finding a new doctor.  I never give bad reviews, but when you move to 12 states in 13 years due to being Military and have to explain yourself to a doctor who acts like they care. But when it comes to helping you till your next New doctor appointment in another state from a recent move and just not caring is unacceptable. We make this country safe so those can persue there dreams. But when you run into a doctor who literally only cares about $$$ it is unfair to those who sacrifice.  Not asking for anything additional just to take care of your patients as you vowed to as a Medical Professional.  Wish my review was better. I hate to leave remarks that may hinder ones image. But the truth always comes out unfortunately.

originalText.text: This Man is really amazing he saved my life and my marriage.. And he's a true friend and kind person.
